description: Theta series of direct sum of 2 copies of D_4 lattice in powers of q^2.
references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 119.
Masao Koike, Modular forms on non-compact arithmetic triangle groups, preprint.
J. McKay and A. Sebbar, Fuchsian groups, automorphic functions and Schwarzians, Math. Ann., 318 (2000), 255-275.
links: B. Brent, Quadratic Minima and Modular Forms, Experimental Mathematics, v.7 no.3, 257-274.
Index entries for sequences related to D_4 lattice
formula: Fourier coefficients of E_{gamma,2}^2.Convolution square of A004011. Convolution fourth power of A108096. - _Michael Somos_, Aug 20 2014
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, n==0, 48 * (sigma(n, 3) + if( n%2, 0, 4*sigma(n/2, 3))))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jul 16 2004 */(MAGMA) A := Basis( ModularForms( Gamma0(8), 4), 62); A[1] + 48*A[3] + 624*A[5]; /* _Michael Somos_, Aug 20 2014 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
